alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 18 at 11:30PM CDT until June 19 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JASPER COUNTY... At 1128 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Montrose, or 10 miles northeast of Bay Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Paulding around 1145 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
